content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Ah, Max, I'm glad you could make it. So, what do you think the rental price for this 25 square meter apartment should be?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible, but I also want to be on good terms with my landlord. Can we discuss both of those factors together?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Of course, Max. While I understand that you want to get the best deal possible, it's also important to maintain a good relationship with your landlord. Let's see if we can find a mutually beneficial solution that works for both of us. What do you think a fair rental price would be for this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am open to negotiating. What do you think a fair rental price would be for this apartment?

And also, I want to make sure that the apartment is in good condition and that the landlord is reliable. Can we discuss those factors as well?

I am also a student, so I am looking for a flexible lease agreement.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
Well, Max, based on the market rates in New York, I would suggest a rental price of around 1500 Euros per month. However, I am open to discussing a lower price if you can provide evidence that you are a responsible tenant and will take good care of the apartment.

As for the condition of the apartment, I can assure you that it is in good condition and has been recently renovated. Additionally, I am a reliable landlord who will make sure that any issues are addressed promptly.

Regarding the lease agreement, I am willing to work with you to find a flexible arrangement that suits your needs as a student. For example, we could consider a shorter lease term or the option to renew the lease at the end of each academic year. Let's discuss these factors further and see if we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
name: Heinrich Heine
